short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Extension automatically integrates Ethos insurance products into Your existing workflow tools to increases productivity!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extension helps improve productivity of an agent by offering Ethos insurance products first. It automatically integrates Ethos portal and products directly into existing workflow tools, i.e. iPipeline. Goal is to simplify and reduce the steps it takes to bind policies for clients so that agent can spend more time growing business!
